pageProduct.name: Aveeno Active Naturals Intense Relief Hand Cream Fragrance Free 100g
pageProduct.description:
Information

.

.

General Information

AVEENO® Intense Relief Hand Cream 100g

Aveeno Active Naturals Intense Relief Hand Cream is specially formulated with natural oatmeal and rich emollients to help repair dry skin and form a protective glove against the elements. This hand cream is non-greasy and moisturises skin for 24 hours. It continues to moisturise even after washing your hands.


  • Moisturising hand cream

  • Fast absorbing and non greasy hand cream

  • Fragrance free formula is gentle enough for even sensitive skin

  • Can also be used on elbows, knees and feet - anywhere your dry skin needs extra help

  • Leaves your hand soft, smooth and naturally healthy-looking

  • Clinically proven to moisturise skin for up to 24 hours

  • Forms a "protective glove" that lasts through hand washing



Discover Aveeno Active Naturals. Simply put, Active Naturals are ingredients derived from nature and uniquely formulated to reveal skin's natural health and beauty.
Essential Active Naturals


  •  Skin-nourishing natural colloidal oatmeal.

Size: 100g

Shelf Life in Days: 1095 days

KEY FEATURES

• Intense Relief Hand Cream
• Moisturises for 24 Hours
• Natural Colloidal Oatmeal





Ingredients

Water, Glycerin, Distearyldimonium Chloride, Petrolatum, Isopropyl Palmitate, Cetyl Alcohol, Aluminium Starch, Octenylsuccinate, Dimethicone, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Flour, Benzyl Alcohol, Sodium Chloride-(F#9932-078)

Directions

Apply daily to hands or wherever skin feels dry to help soothe and protect dry, chapped skin.

USAGE ADVICE

It's also great for use on elbows, knees and feet or anywhere when dry skin needs extra help.
